<p align="center">
  The Vitaale theme for ghostty.
</p>

&nbsp;

<p align="center">
  <img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vitaale/vitaale/refs/heads/main/assets/misc/ghostty-preview.png" alt="vitale preview"/>
</p>

&nbsp;

## Installation

1. Copy the file [vitaale](https://github.com/vitaale/ghostty/blob/main/vitaale) into your [.config/ghostty/themes/](https://ghostty.org/docs/config/reference#theme) directory.
2. Reload or restart Ghostty.
